abstract: Morgan Stanley and Citigroup plan to pull out clients’ money from a nearly $8 billion fund run by the Swiss banking giant Union Bancaire Privée, after learning that it was exposed to Bernard L. Madoff’s operations, people briefed on the matter said.
lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley and Citigroup plan to pull out clients’ money from a nearly $8 billion fund run by the Swiss banking giant Union Bancaire Privée, after learning that it was exposed to Bernard L. Madoff’s operations, people briefed on the matter said.

headline.main: Morgan, Citi to Pull Client Money From Swiss Fund
